about_the_game:
Have you ever thought about being the perfect girlfriend? Now your dreams will come true!

In this girlfriend simulator, you will have complete control over the relationship. Pick one girl you can spend your time with (maybe forever).

First of all, you will need to make money with fun mini-games in order to support your girlfriend. Buys her food and trinkets. Feel the real experience of owning a girl!

Game features:
* A large number of characteristics that you will need to take care of;
* Ability to customize the character;
* The character will react with emotions to your actions or inaction;
* A large number of different items, each of which affects the character in its own way;
* 2 mini-games with which you will earn money;
* If you do not enter the game for a long time, then the character's needs will fall and he will eventually die and the game will start from the beginning;

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in this game are over 18! This game contains scenes of a sexual nature.
